alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton, Echols and west central Clinch Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Moody Air Force Base to 10 miles southwest of I-75 At Exit 16 to 8 miles south of Monticello. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Mayday, Blue Springs and Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
